title: Kavarna Coffeehouse
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Gluten-free, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers veggieburgers, wraps, salads, and soups. Vegan items are marked, and some non-vegan items can be made vegan upon request. Free wireless internet. Shares the same kitchen with its sister delicatessen, Parisi's, which serves meat. Reported no longer all veg as of Dec 2014.
